H0.text: The roe of lumpfish is used as a substitute for which delicacy. Caviar

H1.text: The roe of lumpfish is used as a substitute for which delicacy. Tobiko

H2.text: The roe of lumpfish is used as a substitute for which delicacy. Masago

H3.text: The roe of lumpfish is used as a substitute for which delicacy. Ikra

A4.text: Uses Cyclopterus roe, a good source of omega-3 fatty acids, is used to produce relatively inexpensive caviar substitutes.
